item.title: CVE-2024-24841|2024-02-05T06:27:52.341Z -- Dan's Art -- Add Customer for WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Dan's Art Add Customer for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Add Customer for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.7.
